Room.Name: Oceancrest Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Oceancrest Avenue, just east of the Oceancrest Circle.
Room.LongDescription: The Oceancrest Circle welcomes all visitors to Oceancrest and all the splendor the city has to offer. On the north side of the road is the magnificent and beautiful Wakarimasu Park. On the south side of the road is the Crimson Dragon Traveler's Lodge.
